title: The Alex Jones Show - Alex Jones - ALL FOUR PLUS HOURS - 30 May
description:
THE EMPIRE IS ON THE RUN..........All 4 PLUS Hours AND OVERDRIVE

Alex is known for not just talking the talk, but walking the walk. He combines his media presence with actual physical activism, a practice that once led to him being arrested on the personal order of George W. Bush! Alex Jones has gained international attention for standing up for what he believes in.

From Italy&#039;s La Prensa to the Wall Street Journal and USA Today, Jones has brought the information war to the mainstream print media worldwide, speaking out against tyranny in defense of the Constitution.

Total Recorder 4.4 Capture in 48 kbs stereo from Ku satellite feed or 56 kbs internet streaming audio with commercial edit. About 6.25 hr listening time.

PM me with any of your comments.

Todays gueststopic: 

1st HR. - News and OpenLines. In addition to discussing the latest news and taking your calls, . , and  

2nd HR. - News and OpenLines. Alex welcomes Austin Williams, author of The Enemies of Progress: Dangers of Sustainability, a critic of carbon rationing.
 
3rd HR. - News and OpenLines. Alex also talks with Jeffrey McKay, Deputy Air Pollution Control Officer for the Bay Area Air Quality Management District.

4th HR. - News and OpenLines. Alex also talks with Eric Nordstrom, the man behind the Infowars moneybomb.
